ome.smuggler.web.imports

Class ImportFailureController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ome.smuggler.web.TaskFileStoreAdapter<ImportId>
      • ome.smuggler.web.imports.ImportFailureController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/ome/failed/import")
 @Scope(value="request")
public class ImportFailureController
extends TaskFileStoreAdapter<ImportId>
    Exposes the functionality of the failed import log store to Web clients. A Web client can get the current list of failed imports (i.e. imports that failed permanently, after having being retried) and then download the associated import logs. Normally after the system administrator has resolved the cause of the failure for a specific import, there is no need to keep the log file around anymore and it can be deleted.
